mapper.select: select from tk_article where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

( SELECT r.reply_id id, r.reply_time time, r.reply_cont cont, r.comt_id cid, '' aid, r.user_id uid, 2 type FROM tk_reply r WHERE r.comt_id IN ( SELECT foo.comt_id FROM ( SELECT c.comt_id FROM tk_comment c WHERE c.art_id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) AS foo ) LIMIT 0, 5 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT c.comt_id id, c.comt_time time, c.comt_cont cont, '' cid, c.art_id aid, c.user_id uid, 1 type FROM tk_comment c WHERE c.art_id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
